experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: 1) Developed dashboards & machine learning models to get insights from data and increase the revenue. • Recognized the features of the data which gave business insights and formed a dashboard using Tabaleau.•Used Random Forest Classifier to predict a beneficial deal . Achieved an accuracy of 84.2% and a recall of 73.6%.2) Predicted the months after which a dialysis patient will get critical using XGBoost Model. error obtained <10%.

Achieved an accuracy of 84.2% and a recall of 73.6%.2) Predicted the months after which a dialysis patient will get critical using XGBoost Model. error obtained <10%. <!---->

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Time Series Forecasting Of Cloud Failure:• Applied K nearest neighbors classification model on available data to capture trends of failure.• Developed time series model for forecasting future consumption of various features on which cloud failure depends.• Used the classification model to predict failure on forecasted features.
experience.description_html: Time Series Forecasting Of Cloud Failure:• Applied K nearest neighbors classification model on available data to capture trends of failure.• Developed time series model for forecasting future consumption of various features on which cloud failure depends.• Used the classification model to predict failure on forecasted features. <!---->

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Applications of Machine Learning in CFD•Solution of complex problems in fluid mechanics requires high computational power.•To reduce computational expense, applied various machine learning models to exploit the statistical nature of the problem to accurately make predictions of future states.•Created a well designed neural network and obtained accurate results.•Devised a formula using multivariate polynomial regression with backward elimination.
experience.description_html: Applications of Machine Learning in CFD•Solution of complex problems in fluid mechanics requires high computational power.•To reduce computational expense, applied various machine learning models to exploit the statistical nature of the problem to accurately make predictions of future states.•Created a well designed neural network and obtained accurate results.•Devised a formula using multivariate polynomial regression with backward elimination. <!---->

projects: [{"title":"Sentiment Analysis of customer reviews on e-commerce website","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Oct 2021","description":"Scrapped customer reviews on e-commerce website and established insights between customer reviews and sale of mobile phones."},{"title":"Electricity Consumption Forecasting","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Feb 2020","description":"Worked in a team which helped an electricity company named Dream Vidyut, which wants to electrify India sustainably. It provided us with the electricity meter readings of each hour from April 2017 to December 2017. The company's target was to approximately forecast the electricity demand of a dozen buildings in the Delhi-NCR region so that over-production of electricity can be reduced and thus provide the surplus electricity to places where it is not available."},{"title":"Customer Lifetime Value For An Auto Insurance Company","start_date":"Nov 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"Created a model to predict the customer lifetime value using a given set of features for an auto insurance company and help the company know the type of customers that generate more revenue."},{"title":"Automated checking of engineering drawing sheets","start_date":"May 2019","end_date":"Aug 2019","description":"Developed a method to automate the checking of engineering drawing sheets."}]
